entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning with risk of freezing rain. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 February 2023
